seo.title: Gossip - Share Stories, Connect French Communities
seo.description: Gossip is a modern storytelling platform where French and francophone communities come together to share experiences, connect with others, and discover amazing stories from France and around the world.

home.heroSubtitle: The modern storytelling platform where communities come together to share experiences, connect with others, and discover amazing stories from around the world.
home.signInPrompt: Sign in or create an account to start using Gossip

features.title: Everything you need to collect and share stories
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make storytelling simple and engaging

createEvents.title: Create Events
createEvents.description: Set up storytelling events to collect stories from your community on any topic or occasion.

collectStories.title: Collect Stories
collectStories.description: Share a simple link and let people submit their stories anonymously or with their details.

moderateContent.title: Moderate Content
moderateContent.description: Review, approve, or provide feedback on submitted stories to maintain quality and relevance.

sharePublicly.title: Share Publicly
sharePublicly.description: Create beautiful public displays of approved stories for your community to read and enjoy.

howItWorks.title: How Gossip Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to start collecting amazing stories

step1.title: Create an Event
step1.description: Set up your storytelling event with a title, description, and custom settings.

step2.title: Share the Link
step2.description: Send your event link to friends, community members, or share it publicly.

step3.title: Collect Stories
step3.description: People submit their stories using your simple, beautiful submission form.

step4.title: Curate & Share
step4.description: Review submissions, approve the best ones, and share them with your community.

useCases.title: Perfect for Every Occasion
useCases.subtitle: From personal memories to community events, Gossip adapts to your storytelling needs

wedding.title: Wedding Memories
wedding.description: Collect heartwarming stories and memories from family and friends for the special day.

corporate.title: Team Building
corporate.description: Gather success stories, experiences, and testimonials from team members and clients.

community.title: Community Events
community.description: Document local events, festivals, or community initiatives through shared stories.

education.title: Educational Projects
education.description: Create collaborative storytelling projects for students and educational programs.

cta.title: Ready to Start Collecting Stories?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust Gossip to capture and share their most important moments.
